rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online-November 2

rewards.description: New Class Releases! Intertwined souls, Glaciette Makes Her Debut! Following the Assassin's release, "Glaciette" will make her spectacular debut as the most anticipated new class for Crystal of Atlan's overseas half-anniversary celebration!  "Glaciette" is the Puppeteer's third class branch. She is a Cryo DPS who excels in mid-range combat. She waves her chain around as she dances gracefully on the battlefield, and possesses a unique mechanic that allows her to partner up with her Marionette for a lethal performance.  Join in Glaciette's waltz and experience her elegant and refreshing combat style!
rewards.name: New Class Releasing!

rewards.description: ABI Red Drops Fest Special Event is here! To celebrate Red Drops Fest and ABIS event, we are bringing back this player-favorite gun skin from S1, now you can claim this All-Terrain M110 Marksman Rifle Skin by Twitch Drops! Watch for 2 hours to redeem it now! If you already own this skin in S1, you will automatically receive 500K Koens & L4 Choice Full Bundle as an alternative reward. Please link your Level Infinite Pass account and Twitch account on the event page (https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/twitchdrops ), and claim your Drops rewards in time.
rewards.name: Red Drops Fest ABIS

rewards.description: Destiny: Rising delivers the iconic looter-shooter gameplay from the Destiny franchise to mobile platforms, featuring missions, strikes, PvP battles, and six-player PvE activities along with a variety of open world objectives. The game will offer players dynamic and challenging single, co-op, and competitive multiplayer gameplay. From November 27 to December 24, several fun and challenging PVP gameplays are available and we will give some special in game items as exclusive winter gifts to our fans on Twitch!  Gear up and join the fight in the top-tier sci-fi RPG shooter, Lightbearers!
rewards.name: Thanksgiving Drops
